reference.shortdesc: Permissions are the level of entitlement needed to access content.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The permissions element specifies any preferred controls for access to content.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and the attribute defined below.

dlentry.dd: Specifies the classifications of viewers allowed to view the document. For example, possible values enumerated in earlier versions of DITA included internal, classified, all, and entitled.
